PCClass.Name: Barbarian
PCClass.Feature: Advantage on STR checks/saving throws. Bonus Damage (see table) on STR weapon attacks. Resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, slashing. Can't cast spells while raging. Duration: 1 minute or end of first round that you haven't taken damage or attacked a hostile creature.
Armor Class when unarmored is 10 + DEX + CON (stacks with shields).
Gives/grants advantage on attack rolls (toggle on first attack of turn).
Advantage on Dex saves against effects you can see. Inactive if blinded, deafened, or incapacitated.
You can attack 2x per Attack action.
Gain 10 ft/round speed while not wearing Heavy Armor.
Advantage on initiative. You can act on surprise rounds if you rage first thing.
Extra weapon damage on crit increases by 1 weapon dice. Increases to +2 at 13th and +3 at 17th.
If you drop to 0 HP while raging you can make a DC 10 CON save and drop to 1 HP instead. Each time you use it the DC increases by 5. DC resets after long rest.
Rage only ends early if you fall unconscious or choose to end it.
Use the larger of your STR score or STR check result.
STR and CON scores increase by 4 each, up to 24 max.

PCClass.Name: Bard
PCClass.Feature: Simple, hand crossbows, longswords, rapiers, shortswords.
Can cast bard (ritual) spells as rituals.
Add 1/2 proficiency to ability checks that do not include proficiency bonus.
Friendly creatures gain 1d6 (1d8 at 9th, 1d10 at 13th, 1d12 at 17th) extra health from using HD on short rests.
Choose 2 skills to get double proficiency. At 10th level choose 2 more.
Regain Bardic Inspiration uses on short or long rest.
As action grant friendlies within 30 feet advantage on saves vs fear or charm until end of your next turn.
Learn 2 extra spells from any class. Choose 2 more at 14th and at 18th.
If you roll initiative with no Bardic Inspiration uses left, you regain one use.

PCClass.Name: Cleric
PCClass.Feature: Can cast cleric (ritual) spells as rituals.
Turn Undead: Undead enemies within 30 feet must save (Wis) or be turned for 1 min (or until they take damage). Turned enemies must flee.
Turned enemies under CR level (Table PHB 59) are destroyed outright.
